metadata.title: CVE-2019-6469 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An error in the EDNS Client Subnet (ECS) feature for recursive resolverscan cause BIND to exit with an assertion failure when processing a responsethat has malformed RRSIGs. Versions affected: BIND 9.10.5-S1 -> 9.11.6-S1of BIND 9 Supported Preview Edition.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
